name: AGAIN (itch) (JanAmbrozic)
description:
How to play:

To move around: WASD or arrow buttons
Sword action: Space or left mouse click
Knife throw (after picking it up): X or enter or right mouse click

Try to get as many points as possible.
Credits:
- Zombie sounds by Anders Børup
- Other sounds from https://freesound.org/ && http://soundbible.com/
- Art assets from https://www.gameart2d.com/freebies.html
Source available here: https://github.com/JanAmbrozic/NordicGameJam2019
